article.title: Interaction Between Requesters and a Large Mechanized retrieval System
article.author: Lancaster, F.W.
article.text: In a large mechanized retrieval system, a certain proportion of the search failures are likely to be directly attributable to inadequate user-system interaction.. Request statements may be only distant approximations of actual information requirements.. This paper discusses some of the problems of the user-system interface and suggests methods whereby these problems may be alleviated..
